document_data.title: Laughter in the Flames
document_data.author: [[James Lowder]]
document_data.mainbody: '''"Laughter in the Flames"''' is a short story by [[James Lowder]] included in the 1994 anthology ''[[Realms of Infamy]]''.
document_data.Summary: The [[adventurer]]s [[Hamnet Hawklin]] and [[Gareth Truesilver]] are respected members of the [[Cormyr]]ian [[Society of Stalwart Adventurers]]. When [[Uther (individual)|Uther]], butler of the Society's [[Club Hall]], informs them of a possible passageway to the realm of [[Cyric]], Lord of Strife, the two embark on a journey through the dark alleys of [[Suzail]].
